exercises.instructions: Sit or stand with your back straight. Pull your chin straight back, as if making a double chin. Hold for 5 seconds, then relax.
Sit or stand with your back straight. Slowly tilt your head to one side, bringing your ear toward your shoulder. Hold for 15-30 seconds, then switch sides.
exercises.frequency: Perform 3 repetitions per side, 2 times a day.

exercises.instructions: Sit or stand with your arms at your sides. Squeeze your shoulder blades together and hold for 5 seconds, then relax.
Sit on your hand to stabilize your shoulder. Tilt your head to the opposite side and slightly forward. Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds.
exercises.frequency: Perform 3 repetitions per side, 2 times a day.

exercises.instructions: Sit or stand and grasp the back of your head. Gently pull your head diagonally towards your armpit. Hold for 15-30 seconds.
exercises.frequency: Perform 3 repetitions per side, 2 times a day.
